host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les équipements HP Standard via SNMP}
{EN: Template to check HP Standard equipments using SNMP protocol}
host_templates.alias: Template to check HP Standard devices using SNMP protocol
host_templates.name: Net-HP-Standard-SNMP

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
Plugin pack to monitor HP/HPE standard network equipments via SNMP:
* Cpu
* Hardware
* Memory
* Traffic (by interface name, ID or all interfaces)
* Packets errors
* Communication cast
* Spanning tree
* Uptime

Plugin pack pour superviser les équipements réseau HP/HPE standard via SNMP :
* Cpu
* Hardware
* Memory
* Traffic (by interface name, ID or all interfaces)
* Packets errors
* Communication cast
* Spanning tree
* Uptime

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module:

* 19.04.2 or later
* 19.10.1 or later
* 20.04.0 or later

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: HP Standard Network
